ComicInfo.Summary:
Sandringham: Savage and his men masquerade as statues to spring a surprise on some Volgs who use British prisoners as clay pigeons.
Shako [Part 2]: Shako is interrupted whilst playing by Falmuth, Dollar and Jimbo. But when Jimbo splits into two, Shako has to get rid of one of 'em.
Harlem Heroes Part 21: The Heroes are amazed to hear that Artie Gruber still survives, and learn of their next match against the Bushido Blades!
Hollow World Part 10: Chairman Lo-Han calls off the security perimeter of the Supreme Council, and tells Dare and Rok that everything is going as planned.
Recluse: John Probe must investigate the cause of four missing athletes, all mysteriously called to multi-millionaire Harold Howes' home.
The Solar Sniper: Judges are dying by Gorilla's solar gun, but when Dredd's death note comes up, he arranges a special day for the lawbreaker.
